title: The Chronicles of Moxie by Z.B. Heller [epub,mobi]
description:
Published: May 17th 2014

Moxie Summers is a curvy, twenty-six year-old teacher who has not had the best track record with relationships. In a drunken stupor at a bar, she meets Miles who turns out to be her sparing equal, until she vomits all over his shoes.
